A simple Python CLI toolkit to automate project enhancement using standard config templates.
> Yuhi /y-oo-n-h-ee/ is a Hindi word meaning "casually" or "at random"

## Installation

```
pip install yuhi
```

## Usage

![help_txt](extras/help_txt.png)
